headline: KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) Reports Revenue Surge To US$3,063 Million In Robust Q3 Earnings
summary: KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) recently appointed Jamie E. Samath to its Board of Directors and reported robust third-quarter earnings with revenue surging to $3,063 million. The company's positive outlook included an increased dividend, now at $1.90 per share, and a new buyback program of up to $5,000 million authorized, addressing shareholder returns. Over the past month, KLA's share price rose by 19%, aligning closely with the market's 4% rise in the past seven days. These corporate actions and...

headline: Chips Rebooted: SMH Surges On Trade Truce, Bullish Setup Signals More Upside
summary: The VanEck Semiconductor ETF is up 24% since April, driven by U.S.-China trade news & chip sector momentum. Click here to find out why SMH stock is a Buy.
